basicInfo.name: Javascript
basicInfo.overviewText: JavaScript is a must-have skill for web development, used heavily in both client-side and server-side applications. In this JavaScript full course, you'll get all high-quality lessons.

topicsInfo.description: A closure gives a function access to all variables of its parent function even after that parent function is returned. The function keeps a reference to its outer scope which preserves the scope chain throughout time.
